title: MD
biography: James Edgar Till was a Canadian biophysicist at the University of Toronto, best known for demonstrating – in a partnership with Ernest McCulloch – the existence of stem cells.
aiSummary: James Till is a stem cell biology specialist with an H-index of 29 at University of Toronto (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, JAMA Oncology, The Lancet Healthy Longevity. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
